locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_ACTIVATE_BATCH
locale.value: You will activate the selected tasks. Do you agree?

locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_ACTIVATE_TASK
locale.value: You will activate the selected tasks. Do you agree?

locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_BATCH_REPORT
locale.value: You will generate the selected report. Do you agree?

locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_DEACTIVATE_BATCH
locale.value: You will deactivate the selected tasks. Do you agree?

locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_DEACTIVATE_TASK
locale.value: You will deactivate the selected tasks. Do you agree?

locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_DELETE
locale.value: You will delete the selected records. Do you agree?

locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_DELETE_TASK
locale.value: You will delete the selected task from the scheduller and from all the dependencies containing it. Do you agree?

locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_EMPTY_DATA
locale.value: Warning, criteria values are empty. Do you want to continue?

locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_EXPORT_DOC
locale.value: You will generate a DOC file with the screen data. Do you agree?

locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_EXPORT_EXL
locale.value: You will generate a EXCEL file with the screen data. Do you agree?

locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_EXPORT_PDF
locale.value: You will generate a PDF file with the screen data. Do you agree?

locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_NEW
locale.value: You will store the data on the screen. Do you agree?

locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_NOT_UPDATED_DATA
locale.value: Warning, criteria values have not been modified. Do you want to continue?

locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_PRINT_FILE
locale.value: You will print the screen data. Do you agree?

locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_SND_EML
locale.value: You will send an email to all active users. Do you agree?

locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_TASK_LAUNCH
locale.value: You will launch the selected task. Do you agree?

locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_TRIGGER_WITH_CALENDAR_EXIST
locale.value: The selected calendars are associated with one or more tasks. Are you sure you want to continue?

locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_UNBLOCK_BATCH_KO
locale.value: You will unblock the selected batches setting them as invalid. Do you agree?

locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_UNBLOCK_BATCH_OK
locale.value: You will unblock the selected batches setting them as valid. Do you agree?

locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_UPDATE
locale.value: You will store the data on the screen. Do you agree?

locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_UPDATE_TASK
locale.value: You will store the data on the screen, if the task launch type changes from manual to any other type, it will be removed from all dependencies. Do you agree?

locale.name: CONFIRM_MESSAGE_UPDATED_DATA
locale.value: Warning, changed data will be lost. Do you want to continue?

locale.name: CONFIRM_TITLE_TRIGGER_WITH_CALENDAR_EXIST
locale.value: Confirmation of calendar associated to one or several tasks.

locale.name: HELP_ACCEPT_PRINT_BUTTON
locale.value: Accept print options, launch file generation and close the print dialog

locale.name: HELP_ADD_BUTTON
locale.value: Add new item on the current screen.

locale.name: HELP_BACK_BUTTON
locale.value: Go back to the previous screen

locale.name: HELP_CANCEL_PRINT_BUTTON
locale.value: Cancel the print options and close the print dialog

locale.name: HELP_CLOSE_HELP_BUTTON
locale.value: Close the dialog with screen help

locale.name: HELP_CREATE_NEW_LOCAL_BUTTON
locale.value: Create a new locale and store it in the locales xml files

locale.name: HELP_DELETE_BUTTON
locale.value: Remove the selected items in the grid

locale.name: HELP_HELP_BUTTON
locale.value: Open a dialog with screen help

locale.name: HELP_NEW_BUTTON
locale.value: Go to a new screen to add a new item

locale.name: HELP_PRINT_ACTION_CRITERION
locale.value: Select an action to do: Generate files, send files by e-mail or print files

locale.name: HELP_PRINT_BUTTON
locale.value: Open a dialog with screen print options

locale.name: HELP_PRINT_DESTINATION_USERS_CRITERION
locale.value: Select the users which you want to send the data to

locale.name: HELP_PRINT_FORMAT_CRITERION
locale.value: Select the file formats which you want to retrieve the data

locale.name: HELP_PRINT_NUMERIC_FORMAT_CRITERION
locale.value: Select the format you want to apply to the numeric data

locale.name: HELP_PRINT_SELECTION_CRITERION
locale.value: Select what you want to print: All tabs in the screen or only the selected one

locale.name: HELP_SCREEN_HELP
locale.value: Dialogue with the definition of the window components and its help

locale.name: HELP_SCREEN_NEW_SCHEDULER_SERVER
locale.value: In this screen, you can define the settings for a new server

locale.name: HELP_SCREEN_NEW_SCHEDULER_TASK
locale.value: In this screen you can define the configuration of a new scheduled task

locale.name: HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_PRINT_EMAIL
locale.value: Dialog that allows you to generate files with the window information, print and/or send them by mail

locale.name: HELP_SCREEN_TITLE_AWEKEY
locale.value: Manage application unique keys for sequences

locale.name: HELP_SCREEN_TITLE_BROADCAST
locale.value: Send a broadcast message. If you let the 'User' criterion empty, the message is sent to all connected users in the application

locale.name: HELP_SCREEN_TITLE_SECURITY_SCREEN
locale.value: Manage secure access to the application screens

locales.locale:
Manage application sites. Here you can view, add, delete and modify all application sites.
A site is defined as a *separated application node*, with it's own [databases](#databases) and [modules](#modules).

locale.name: HELP_SCREEN_TITLE_STL_CNF
locale.value: Report style configuration screen. Here you can configure the reports aspects, like font color or grid background

locale.name: HELP_SCREEN_TITLE_THM
locale.value: Manage application themes. Here you can view, add, delete and modify all available application themes

locale.name: HELP_SCREEN_TITLE_UNIKEY
locale.value: Manage application unique keys for sequences.

locale.name: HELP_SCREEN_TITLE_USR
locale.value: Manage application users. Here you can view, add, delete and modify all application users

locale.name: HELP_SCREEN_UPDATE_SCHEDULER_TASK
locale.value: In this screen you can update the configuration of a scheduled task

locale.name: HELP_SEARCH_BUTTON
locale.value: Search in the list filtering with the selected criteria

locale.name: HELP_UPDATE_BUTTON
locale.value: Go to a new screen with the selected item data in which you can update the item information

locale.name: HELP_VIEW_BUTTON
locale.value: Go to a new screen with the selected item data, just to check it

locale.name: INFO_MESSAGE_PARSING_NUMBER_NULL
locale.value: Parameter {0} can''t be parsed as number: ''{1}'' - Set as null

locale.name: MESSAGE_SCHEDULER_DELETE_CALENDAR
locale.value: Are you sure you want to delete this calendar?

locale.name: MESSAGE_SCHEDULER_DELETE_CALENDAR_WITH_ASSOCIATED_TASKS
locale.value: There are some task associated to the calendar. \nAre you sure you want to delete this calendar?\nThe calendar will also be deleted from the task.

locale.name: MSG_PASSWD_NEW
locale.value: After entering the password press confirm button

locale.name: OK_MESSAGE_CLEARING_ALL_CACHE
locale.value: All caches have been cleared sucessfully

locale.name: OK_MESSAGE_LAUNCHING_BATCH
locale.value: Batch process has been launched successfully. You will be redirected to process status screen to watch process status.

locale.name: OK_MESSAGE_LOCAL_UPDATED
locale.value: The localee -{0}- has been updated sucessfully

locale.name: OK_MESSAGE_MAINTAIN_OPERATION
locale.value: The selected maintain operation has been succesfully performed

locale.name: OK_MESSAGE_MESSAGE_SENT
locale.value: Message has been sent to the users sucessfully

locale.name: OK_MESSAGE_NEW_LOCAL
locale.value: The locale -{0}- has been generated sucessfully

locale.name: OK_MESSAGE_REMOVED_LOCAL
locale.value: The localee -{0}- has been deleted sucessfully

locale.name: PARAMETER_LAUNCH_DEPENDENCIES_ERROR
locale.value: Launch dependencies in case of error

locale.name: PARAMETER_LAUNCH_DEPENDENCIES_WARN
locale.value: Launch dependencies in case of warning

locale.name: PARAMETER_SET_WARNING_ERROR
locale.value: Set execution as warning in case of dependency error

locale.name: SCHEDULER_BATCH_LAUNCH_ERROR_MESSAGE
locale.value: There has been an error launching the batch file.

locale.name: SCHEDULER_BATCH_LAUNCH_MESSAGE
locale.value: The batch has been correctly launched

locale.name: SCREEN_TEXT_INFORMATION_MESSAGE_1
locale.value: You can select the option you need on the dropdown menu.

locale.name: SCREEN_TEXT_INFORMATION_MESSAGE_2
locale.value: If you want to exit the application, press the logout button on the top right side of the screen.

locale.name: SCREEN_TEXT_SELECT_FILE
locale.value: Put file name without any extension

locale.name: TITLE_SCHEDULER_DELETE_CALENDAR_WITH_ASSOCIATED_TASKS
locale.value: There are some task associtated to the calendar.

locale.name: VALIDATOR_MESSAGE_DIVISIBLE_BY
locale.value: Veuillez entrer un nombre divisible par {value2}

locale.name: VALIDATOR_MESSAGE_EMAIL
locale.value: Please enter a valid email address

locale.name: VALIDATOR_MESSAGE_EQUAL
locale.value: Please enter the same value again

locale.name: VALIDATOR_MESSAGE_EQUAL_LENGTH
locale.value: Please enter a value size equal to {value2} characters

locale.name: VALIDATOR_MESSAGE_GREATER_OR_EQUAL
locale.value: Please enter a value higher or equal to {value2}

locale.name: VALIDATOR_MESSAGE_GREATER_THAN
locale.value: Please enter a value higher than {value2}

locale.name: VALIDATOR_MESSAGE_INTEGER
locale.value: Please enter a valid integer number

locale.name: VALIDATOR_MESSAGE_LESS_OR_EQUAL
locale.value: Please enter a value lower or equal to {value2}

locale.name: VALIDATOR_MESSAGE_LESS_THAN
locale.value: Please enter a value lower than {value2}

locale.name: VALIDATOR_MESSAGE_MAXLENGTH
locale.value: Please enter a value size lower than {value2} characters

locale.name: VALIDATOR_MESSAGE_MINLENGTH
locale.value: Please enter a value size higher than {value2} characters

locale.name: VALIDATOR_MESSAGE_PATTERN
locale.value: The value entered doesn't fit the validation requirements

locale.name: VALIDATOR_MESSAGE_RANGE
locale.value: Please enter a value between {from} and {to}

locale.name: VALIDATOR_MESSAGE_TEXT
locale.value: Please enter a valid text. Numbers and white spaces are not allowed

locale.name: VALIDATOR_MESSAGE_TEXT_WHITESPACES
locale.value: Please enter a valid text. Numbers are not allowed

locale.name: VALIDATOR_MESSAGE_TIME
locale.value: Please enter a valid time, between 00:00:00 and 23:59:59

locale.name: WARNING_MESSAGE_DUPLICATED_SERVER
locale.value: The name of mail server already exist

locale.name: WARNING_MESSAGE_DUPLICATED_USER
locale.value: The new user name is already registered

locale.name: WARNING_MESSAGE_LOCAL_ALREADY_EXISTS
locale.value: Warning! The localee -{0}- already exists and it will NOT be overwritten
